Class JobLauncherUtils

extends java.lang.Object

      • flattenWorkUnits

        public static java.util.List<gobblin.source.workunit.WorkUnit> flattenWorkUnits(java.util.List<gobblin.source.workunit.WorkUnit> workUnits)
        Utility method that takes in a List of WorkUnits, and flattens them. It builds up the flattened list by checking each element of the given list, and seeing if it is an instance of MultiWorkUnit. If it is then it calls itself on the WorkUnits returned by MultiWorkUnit.getWorkUnits(). If not, then it simply adds the WorkUnit to the flattened list.
        Parameters:
        workUnits - is a List containing either WorkUnits or MultiWorkUnits
        Returns:
        a List of flattened WorkUnits

      • cleanStagingData

        public static void cleanStagingData(java.util.List<? extends gobblin.configuration.State> states,
                                    org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Cleanup the staging data for a list of Gobblin tasks. This method calls the cleanTaskStagingData(State, Logger) method.
        Parameters:
        states - a List of States that need their staging data cleaned
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • cleanJobStagingData

        public static void cleanJobStagingData(gobblin.configuration.State state,
                                       org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Cleanup staging data of all tasks of a job.
        Parameters:
        state - a State instance storing job configuration properties
        logger - a Logger used for logging
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • cleanTaskStagingData

        public static void cleanTaskStagingData(gobblin.configuration.State state,
                                        org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Cleanup staging data of a Gobblin task.
        Parameters:
        state - a State instance storing task configuration properties
        logger - a Logger used for logging
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • cleanTaskStagingData

        public static void cleanTaskStagingData(gobblin.configuration.State state,
                                        org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                        com.google.common.io.Closer closer,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ParallelRunner> parallelRunners)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Cleanup staging data of a Gobblin task using a ParallelRunner.
        Parameters:
        state - workunit state.
        logger - a Logger used for logging.
        closer - a closer that registers the given map of ParallelRunners. The caller is responsible for closing the closer after the cleaning is done.
        parallelRunners - a map from FileSystem URI to ParallelRunner.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to cleanup the task staging data.
